text: f nonseminoma extragonadal germ cell tumors may include the following:         -  Combination chemotherapy followed by surgery to remove any remaining tumor.     - A clinical trial of a new treatment.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with malignant extragonadal non-seminomatous germ cell tumor.
